item.title: Seeding Neo4j using a Backup on Docker
item.description: In this post, I’ll walk through how you can take a backup of an existing database and use it to seed an instance of Neo4j inside a Docker container. This could be useful if you are looking to fire up a development server using real data. I’ll show you how how to launch an instance of Neo4j using docker-compose and then extend the official Docker image by creating a custom Dockerfile.
